entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WPF App corrupted when using GitHub Action setup-dotnet for .NET 6 #23870

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.2xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.2xx SDK #sdk-120042-.NET6.0.2xxSDK #22924
  • dotnet restore "error NU1100: Unable to resolve '{package}' for 'net5.0'" when dotnet-sdk-6.0 installed #23874
  • Reference assemblies in publish output #23869
  • 'Could not load file or assembly' exception when referencing console app from web app #23477
    Discussion
  • Webdeploy fails | Serving HTML Files with DotNetCore on IIS #23803

PullRequests

Created

  • Hard code a few system.net.http versions #23871
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23862
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • 6.0.201 servicing branding #23831
    Area-Infrastructure, Branding
  • Embed fSharp.Core --- retarget to release/6.0.3xx branch #23856
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1604390 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
